resources.string: Allows applications to read voicemail data from vnotes content provider.
Allows applications to compose voicemail messages to vnotes content provider.

"The Deleted folder is now full.
Would you like to empty the Deleted folder to clear space for the future?"

"The Inbox is now full. New messages cannot be downloaded.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space for new messages."

"Messages cannot be restored because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

"Messages cannot be moved because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

"The Inbox is now full. New messages cannot be downloaded or moved.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."
You have new voicemail that cannot be downloaded.
To setup your voicemail greeting and other options, please tap the Personalize now button.
One or more messages are locked. You have to unlock messages before deleting.
Your voicemail inbox is full. You cannot receive new voicemail until you listen to some messages, or unlock locked messages, so they can be auto-deleted.
In order to carbon copy your voicemail, you must first supply an email address.
No activity to handle email application Intent.
Message will be carbon copied to

"Welcome to Voicemail. In order to receive %1$s voicemail on this handset please make sure you have data plan.
%2$s"
To use this voicemall application you must forward your voicemails (missed calls) to Smith Micro voicemail system.
"We're Sorry, but our 30-day free trial is full now. We hope to be launching our service in near feature.Please check back later."
Call forwarding is not enabled for this handset. Please be patient we will update the build soon.

" \u0009\u0009<V2T> \u0009\u0009\u0009<transcription> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<messageCount>1</messageCount> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<transcriptionProcessing> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<qos>GOLD</qos> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009</transcriptionProcessing> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<transcriptionMessage> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<languageCode>en</languageCode> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<confidenceLevel>1.0</confidenceLevel> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009<text>Visual Voicemail-to-Text is an add-on service available to Visual Voicemail customers.
This service allows you to have your voicemail systematically transcribed from voice into text and then presented within the Visual Voicemail client.</text> \u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009</transcriptionMessage> \u0009\u0009\u0009</transcription> \u0009\u0009</V2T>"

Welcome to Voicemail. Smith Micro Voicemail application uses text messaging (SMS), Internet access, and call forwarding service to manage your voicemails on the handset. Check with your wireless carrier to understand the charges that may apply. If you have unlimited data and messaging plans then you should be good to use this application.

"Thank you for subscribing to the Voicemail-to-Text 24 Hour Day Pass service. We're updating your account now and we'll notify you when it's completed.
Once active all new messages will be transcribed to text."

"Thank you for subscribing to the Voicemail-to-Text %1$s service. We're updating your account now and we'll notify you when it's completed.
Once active all new messages will be transcribed to text."

"You are signing up to try the %1$s for Voicemail-to-Text Service that will expire %2$s.
Do you wish to continue signing up for this trial?
You will not be automatically subscribed when your trial is over, but a reminder will be sent upon trial completion."

"Your %1$s for Voicemail-to-Text is being activated. We will notify you when it's completed.
New voicemail messages will be transcribed to text for one month and will expire %2$s.
Thank you. "

"Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from Voicemail-to-Text?
Messages will no longer be transcribed after this month's billing cycle."

"Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from Voicemail-to-Text?
Your FREE trial is still active, messages will be transcribed for %d days."

"Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from Voicemail-to-Text?
Your FREE trial is still active, messages will be transcribed for %d day."

"Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from Voicemail-to-Text Free Trial?
Messages will no longer be transcribed and any time remaining in the free trial will be lost."

"You have been unsubscribed from the Voicemail-to-Text service.
Messages will continue to be transcribed until the end of this month's billing cycle.
Thank you for using this service."

In order to deactivate this service you must complete a short exit survey. You must complete this survey to restore your existing voicemail.
This will activate your phone number on Smith Micro VMS system.Press Continue to activate.
This will deactivate your phone number on Smith Micro VMS system and also revert back to carrier voicemail system. Press Continue to deactivate.

Voicemail service will not be interrupted while we verify the account status."

Voicemail service will not be interrupted while we verify the account status."

There is a delay in verifying account information.

Error T%02d: Timeout connecting to server. We will continue retrying in the background and notify you upon completion of the check.
Communication with the Voicemail-to-Text server has timed out. We will continue retrying in the background and notify you upon completion of the check.

Error V%1$02d: Voice message will be sent when you return to %2$s service.
Error T%1$02d: We will continue retrying in the background when you return to %2$s service.

RECORDING SPEECH DATA. As part of the Service, %1$s also copies and uses Speech Data, as defined below, to tune, enhance and improve the speech recognition and other components of the Service, and other %2$s services and products. In accepting the terms and conditions of this Agreement, you acknowledge, consent and agree that %3$s may make copies of the Speech Data as part of the Service. Such information shall be used only by %4$s or third parties acting under the direction of %5$s, pursuant to confidentiality agreements, to tune, enhance and improve the speech recognition and other components of the Service, and other %6$s services and products. %7$s will not use the information elements in any Speech Data for any purpose except as set forth above. Speech Data means the audio files or portions of such files, associated transcriptions and log files provided by you hereunder or generated in connection with the Service.

RECORDING SPEECH DATA. As part of the Service, Sprint also copies and uses Speech Data, as defined below, to tune, enhance and improve the speech recognition and other components of the Service, and other Sprint services and products. In accepting the terms and conditions of this Agreement, you acknowledge, consent and agree that Sprint may make copies of the Speech Data as part of the Service. Such information shall be used only by Sprint or third parties acting under the direction of Sprint, pursuant to confidentiality agreements, to tune, enhance and improve the speech recognition and other components of the Service, and other Sprint services and products. Sprint will not use the information elements in any Speech Data for any purpose except as set forth above. Speech Data means the audio files or portions of such files, associated transcriptions and log files provided by you hereunder or generated in connection with the Service.
Voicemail failed to provision. Please contact customer solutions.

"Visual Voicemail allows you to see who each message is from without having to dial into a system, similar to an email inbox. It allows you to listen to the messages in any order you choose.
We are also offering a free 1 month trial to our Voicemail-to-Text service. With this service you'll also have the ability to read transcriptions of your voicemails.
Tap on the Learn about FREE Trial button to get more information about the Voicemail-to-Text free trial. "

"Visual Voicemail now offers the ability to transcribe your audio messages to text.
We are offering a 1 month free trial of our Voicemail-to-Text service. This service will transcribe your voicemails into text allowing you to read them or listen to them at your convenience.
Tap on the Learn about FREE Trial button to get more information about the Voicemail-to-Text free trial. "

"We offer a 1 month free trial of our Voicemail-to-Text service. This service will transcribe your voicemails into text allowing you to read them or listen to them at your convenience.
Voicemail-to-Text allows you to: - Read your messages when you're in an environment that is too loud to hear messages. - Copy and paste information to your calendar, tasks,contacts, emails etc. - Search your messages using keywords.
Sign up for the free trial now and have fun reading your voicemails! "
You agreed to send speech data to assist with the quality of this product
You disagreed to send speech data to assist with the quality of this product
